ingredients.content: 1500 g fresh tomatoes, ripe, peeled and deseeded

preparations.content: Place onions, basil leaves, garlic and salt in mixing bowl then mix <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula. Mix again <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add 40 g oil and, without measuring cup, fry <b>10 min/90°C/speed 2<b>.
Add tomato purée, tomatoes, and remaining 40 g oil then, with simmering basket instead of measuring cup on mixing bowl lid, cook <b>40 min/90°C/speed 2<b>. Serve immediately.
